description:
Leader of the rebels on the planet Mizun, Stella assists Daba and the others when they first arrive to the planet and they join his rebel movement. Daba and Stella constantly have conflicting views, in particular Stella`s habit of throwing money to the rebels. Stella also threatens his own allies with execution when he suspects them of disloyalty. Stella initially holds Amu hostage when Daba and the others first join them but she shows a lot of admiration for him.

Stella is severely injured when the Poseidal Military attacks his main base of Little Saye and is killed during another attack shortly after. His death causes many members of the rebel movement to depart in fear of their fate.
name: Stella Coban
